sourceMeaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>private</radical> <radical>bow</radical> made of <radical>insect</radical>s that's extremely <kanji>strong</kanji>. Insect bodies are really durable, so they make for strong bows. You also have to be strong to use it, since it was made just for strong arms.
meaningInfo: Imagine holding this strong bow in your strong arms. Look closer at the little insect bodies that make it up. Thanks for your help, little guys.
readingMnemonic: You had this <kanji>strong</kanji> bow made especially for you in <ja><reading>きょう</reading>と</ja>. <ja>きょうと</ja> is famous for their strong bows, so if you ever want another, you know where to go.
readingInfo: Imagine all the strong people who live in <ja>きょうと</ja> and make strong things. You should go there someday!
